parameters.name: Visible
parameters.description: True to display the leader, false to not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Multiple
parameters.description: True to display multiple leaders, false to not

title: ICallout.SetLeader
description: Sets the leader properties of the callout.
signature:
System.Boolean SetLeader( 
   System.Boolean
Visible
,
   System.Boolean
Multiple
)

parameters.name: Visible
parameters.description: True to display the leader, false to not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Multiple
parameters.description: True to display multiple leaders, false to not

returns: True if the operation is successful, false if not
remarks:
You can only use this method before the callout is shown or while the callout is hidden.
If Visible is set to false, then
ICallout::TargetStyle
is automatically set to swCalloutTargetStyle_None.
